TEXT.TITLE: ALPHA INDUSTRIES <AHA> GETS FAVORABLE DECISION
TEXT.BODY: Alpha Industries Inc said the U.S. Court of Appeals has upheld a lower court decision dismissing a class action shareholder suit that had alleged violations of Securities and Exchange Commission disclosure requirements and racketeering laws. Reuter
